data.actual_result: Discord displays your friend's list, and shows "No Text Channels"
data.expected_result: Discord should take you to where you last were at on Discord.
data.short_description: On Discord Refresh, Discord displays "No Text Channel" rather than take you back to where you last were.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord canary, and enter a random channel on any random server. - Hit Ctrl + R to refresh
